metadata.synopsis: The player is cured from poison ( the status DEN_APPRENTICE_THORN). This status has 3 stages leading to death. Each time the player make a long rest, they get closer to death.This PAD of relief plays only if the status reached the stages 2 or 3. The status was getting worse and worse, which must have been worrying, but now they've been cured.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I can feel the poison clearing - I'm cured!
